name: vega-voronoi
description: Voronoi diagram transform for Vega dataflows.
author: Jeffrey Heer (http://idl.cs.washington.edu)

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-voronoi:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-voronoi.js -- index.js
